transcript:
almost everybody's a narcissist that's
the crazy part about it there's a a term
called conversational narcissist that
was coined by a sociologist uh named
Charles duber A conversational
narcissist is a person who consistently
turns the focus of conversations towards
themselves and their experiences making
the other person feel as if they were
just unheard because they failed to give
any consideration or response to the
other person's experiences or the other
person's feelings so this over time
really starts to undermine the
experiences of other people in
conversation with them and so if you
really want to be a great
conversationalist and you don't want to
be a conversational narcissist remember
this try to seek to hear more than you
actually want to be heard
